text: Muminasakalara ocarata nabi haiche te'omlokara nijatakaiyo bechi ghanista, arau te'omra straisakala te'omlokara matr. Allahara bidhana anuyayi mumina arau muhajirasakalatakai atmiya-sbajanasakala parasparae bechi ocarata. Kintu tomaloke tomalokara bandhu-bandharara prati kalyanamulaka kiba karaiba bicaraile seya sukiya katha. Eya kitabata lipibad'dha ache
